Educational Qualification: Matriculation / 12th Class from Govt. Recognized Board. DOEACC Qualification required. Detailed qualification check out official notice. 
How to Apply: Eligible Interested candidates are required to Apply Online through UPSSSC Website on or before 12/01/2017 . 
Important Dates: 
Online Registration Last Date -> 12/01/2017 Fee Deposition Last Date -> 14/01/2017 For Submission Last Date -> 16/01/2017
